summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5891 for the improvement of West Bertona Street, from 3rd Avenue West to Conkling Place; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77614 as amended by Ordinance No. 77794, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
